title: what if Kai'Sa didn't know how to dance??
body:
Do you think management of KD/A would have hired people to help train Kai'Sa to dance the way they want her to?

https://i.imgur.com/vtBK8sC.jpg[]

Kai'Sa never seemed to be someone who wants the spotlight. 

They are forcing this on her, though. 

But, Kai'Sa is just a video game character and not a real person so who cares ???

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zTzmvQb24jY

Do you think these champions realize they are a product to be consumed by league of legends players?

Do you think it is a coincidence that the KDA singers picked cute girls

{{champion:103}}  {{champion:84}} {{champion:28}}  {{champion:145}} 

to be KDA 

this is disgusting
